channel.title: Publications on Gamificação ORG
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Gamificação ORG

item.title: Launch of article on heuristic evaluation
item.description: On April 10, 2025, the article “Gamified heuristic evaluation: methods and outcomes” was published in the Journal of Applied Gamification. The study introduces a protocol for incorporating game elements into interface evaluation, focusing on user experience.
